member.name: M:Gu.Wpf.ToolTips.AdornedElementProxy.MeasureOverride(System.Windows.Size)
member.summary: AdornedElementProxy measure behavior is to measure only the first visual child. Note that the return value of Measure on this child is ignored as the purpose of this class is to match the size of the element for which this is a placeholder.
member.returns: The desired size of the control.

member.name: M:Gu.Wpf.ToolTips.AdornedElementProxy.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)
member.summary: Default AdornedElementProxy arrangement is to only arrange the first visual child. No transforms will be applied.

member.name: P:Gu.Wpf.ToolTips.AdornedElementProxy.AdornedElement
member.summary: Element for which the AdornedElementProxy is reserving space.

member.name: M:Gu.Wpf.ToolTips.TouchToolTipAdorner.GetVisualChild(System.Int32)
member.summary:
Derived class must implement to support Visual children. The method must return the child at the specified index. Index must be between 0 and GetVisualChildrenCount-1.
By default a Visual does not have any children.
Remark: During this virtual call it is not valid to modify the Visual tree.

member.summary: Helper class with attached properties for the TouchToolTipAdorner Enables using it in syles

member.name: F:Gu.Wpf.ToolTips.TouchToolTipService.DefaultVisibleProxyProperty
